articles.description: Roberto Mancini's position as Italy boss is increasingly under threat after a year to forget since winning the European Championships last summer.
articles.content:
It wasn't only England and Gareth Southgate who endured a night to forget on Tuesday with Italy also on the receiving end of a heavy defeat in the UEFA Nations League.
Roberto Mancini's position as … [+2764 chars]

articles.author: Claudia Aoraha
articles.title: Ex-boxer Julius Francis in the clear as police DROP probe after being filmed knocking reveller out - Daily Mail
articles.description: Julius Francis, 57, was filmed in the punch-up outside Boxpark near Wembley Stadium, which left a man unconscious on the ground on Saturday. But police have now dropped the probe.
articles.content:
Do you know the man who was floored by Julius Francis?

articles.author: Jacob Ranson
articles.title: England fans are calling for Brighton boss Graham Potter to replace Gareth Southgate - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Three Lions were thrashed 4-0 by Hungary at the Molineux Stadium to leave Southgate's side sitting bottom of Group A3 in the Nations League after two defeats to Hungary.
articles.content:
England fans are calling for Graham Potter to replace current boss Gareth Southgate after their worst home defeat in 94 years.
